import React from "react"; import {Card,CardBody} from "reactstrap" import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import calculateAvgRating from "../utils/avgRating,js"; import "./tour-card.css" const TourCard = ({tour})=>{ const {id,title,city,photo,price,featured,reviews} = tour const { totalRating , avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(re) return
{featured &&Featured}
{city} {avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating=== 0 ? 'Not rated' : ({reviews.length})}
{title}
${price} /per person
} export default TourCard;
